SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.teatrove.trove.util
Class MergedClass

java.lang.Object
  org.teatrove.trove.util.MergedClass

public class MergedClass
extends Object

Merges several classes together, producing a new class that has all of the methods of the combined classes. All methods in the combined class delegate to instances of the source classes. If multiple classes implement the same method, the first one provided is used. The merged class implements all of the interfaces provided by the source classes or interfaces.

This class performs a function almost the same as the Proxy class introduced in JDK1.3. It differs in that it supports classes as well as interfaces as input, and it binds to wrapped objects without using runtime reflection. It is less flexible than Proxy in that there isn't way to customize the method delegation, and so it isn't suitable for creating dynamically generated interface implementations.

Author:
Brian S O'Neill, Nick Hagan

Nested Class Summary
static interface MergedClass.InstanceFactory
          InstanceFactory allows merged class instances to be requested only when first needed.
static interface MergedClass.InvocationEventObserver
          Instances of the InvocationEventObserver can optionally be passed as a parameter to an overloaded MergedClass constructor.

Method Detail

getConstructor

public static Constructor getConstructor(ClassInjector injector,
                                         Class[] classes)
                                  throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns the constructor for a class that merges all of the given source classes. The constructor's parameter types match the source classes. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if any of the given conditions are not satisfied:
  • None of the given classes can represent a primitive type
  • A source class can only be provided once
  • Any non-public classes must be in the same common package
  • Duplicate methods cannot have conflicting return types
  • The given classes must be loadable from the given injector
  • At most 254 classes may be merged
Note: Because a constructor is limited to 254 parameters, if more than 254 classes are to be merged together, call getConstructor2(org.teatrove.trove.util.ClassInjector, java.lang.Class[]).

Parameters:
injector - ClassInjector that will receive class definition
classes - Source classes used to derive merged class
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException

getConstructor

public static Constructor getConstructor(ClassInjector injector,
                                         Class[] classes,
                                         String[] prefixes)
                                  throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns the constructor for a class that merges all of the given source classes. The constructor's parameter types match the source classes. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if any of the given conditions are not satisfied:
  • None of the given classes can represent a primitive type
  • A source class can only be provided once, unless paired with a unique prefix.
  • Any non-public classes must be in the same common package
  • Duplicate methods cannot have conflicting return types, unless a prefix is provided.
  • The given classes must be loadable from the given injector
  • At most 254 classes may be merged
To help resolve ambiguities, a method prefix can be specified for each passed in class. For each prefixed method, the non-prefixed method is also generated, unless that method conflicts with the return type of another method. If any passed in classes are or have interfaces, then those interfaces will be implemented only if there are no conflicts.

The array of prefixes may be null, have null elements or be shorter than the array of classes. A prefix of "" is treated as null.

Note: Because a constructor is limited to 254 parameters, if more than 254 classes are to be merged together, call getConstructor2(org.teatrove.trove.util.ClassInjector, java.lang.Class[]).

Parameters:
injector - ClassInjector that will receive class definition
classes - Source classes used to derive merged class
prefixes - Optional prefixes to apply to methods of each generated class to eliminate duplicate method names
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException

getConstructor

public static Constructor getConstructor(ClassInjector injector,
                                         Class[] classes,
                                         String[] prefixes,
                                         int observerMode)
                                  throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns the constructor for a class that merges all of the given source classes. The constructor's parameter types match the source classes. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if any of the given conditions are not satisfied:
  • None of the given classes can represent a primitive type
  • A source class can only be provided once, unless paired with a unique prefix.
  • Any non-public classes must be in the same common package
  • Duplicate methods cannot have conflicting return types, unless a prefix is provided.
  • The given classes must be loadable from the given injector
  • At most 254 classes may be merged
To help resolve ambiguities, a method prefix can be specified for each passed in class. For each prefixed method, the non-prefixed method is also generated, unless that method conflicts with the return type of another method. If any passed in classes are or have interfaces, then those interfaces will be implemented only if there are no conflicts. An optional implementation of the MethodInvocationEventObserver interface may be supplied.

The array of prefixes may be null, have null elements or be shorter than the array of classes. A prefix of "" is treated as null.

Note: Because a constructor is limited to 254 parameters, if more than 254 classes are to be merged together, call getConstructor2(org.teatrove.trove.util.ClassInjector, java.lang.Class[]).

Parameters:
injector - ClassInjector that will receive class definition
classes - Source classes used to derive merged class
prefixes - Optional prefixes to apply to methods of each generated class to eliminate duplicate method names
observerMode - int Invocation event handling modes.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException

getConstructor2

public static Constructor getConstructor2(ClassInjector injector,
                                          Class[] classes)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns the constructor for a class that merges all of the given source classes. The constructor accepts one parameter type: an MergedClass.InstanceFactory. Merged instances are requested only when first needed. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if any of the given conditions are not satisfied:
  • None of the given classes can represent a primitive type
  • A source class can only be provided once
  • Any non-public classes must be in the same common package
  • Duplicate methods cannot have conflicting return types
  • The given classes must be loadable from the given injector

Parameters:
injector - ClassInjector that will receive class definition
classes - Source classes used to derive merged class
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException

                                          Class[] classes,
                                          String[] prefixes,
                                          int observerMode)
                                   throws IllegalArgumentException
Returns the constructor for a class that merges all of the given source classes. The constructor accepts one parameter type: an MergedClass.InstanceFactory. Merged instances are requested only when first needed. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if any of the given conditions are not satisfied:
  • None of the given classes can represent a primitive type
  • A source class can only be provided once, unless paired with a unique prefix.
  • Any non-public classes must be in the same common package

For each prefixed method, the non-prefixed method is also generated, unless that method conflicts with the return type of another method. If any passed in classes are or have interfaces, then those interfaces will be implemented only if there are no conflicts. An optional implementation of the MethodInvocationEventObserver interface may be supplied.

buildClassFile

public static ClassFile buildClassFile(String className,
                                       Class[] classes)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
Just create the bytecode for the merged class, but don't load it. Since no ClassInjector is provided to resolve name conflicts, the class name must be manually provided.

Parameters:
className - name to give to merged class
classes - Source classes used to derive merged class
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException

buildClassFile

                                       Class[] classes,
                                       String[] prefixes)

Parameters:

prefixes - Optional prefixes to apply to methods of each generated class to eliminate duplicate method names

buildClassFile

public static ClassFile buildClassFile(String className,
                                       Class[] classes,
                                       String[] prefixes,
                                       int observerMode)
                                throws IllegalArgumentException
Just create the bytecode for the merged class, but don't load it. Since no ClassInjector is provided to resolve name conflicts, the class name must be manually provided. An optional implementation of the MethodInvocationEventObserver interface may be supplied.

Parameters:
className - name to give to merged class
classes - Source classes used to derive merged class
prefixes - Optional prefixes to apply to methods of each generated class to eliminate duplicate method names
observeMethods - boolean Enable function call profiling.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException
